Ballista.description: This ballista is bolted onto a ship's deck, a city wall, or another large area. Ballistae cost 4,000 sc.

actions.name: Attack
actions.effect: A creature within 5 ft of the Ballista can spend 3 AP to make a siege weapon attack vs AR. This attack suffers a -3 penalty if the target is Medium or smaller. Hit: 4d10 sharp.
